TopicTitle: Parts can go through each other

Articles.Content:
No time warp or physics warp, it only does this when it is on the same ship. Just get landing gear and it can go through any party, and will not bend even if it is connected to the main ship by a bendy part.

Windows 7 64 bit

Windows 32 bit ksp download

Version .90.0.725
Physics was disabled between parts of the same vessel back in 0.18.....

Yeah, this one is intended. It helps avoid Kraken-like behaviour when parts on the same vessel are clipped through each other, although it's not a very elegant solution and I personally hope it gets revisited at some point.
I don't recall anything of the sort happening in 0.23.5. Perhaps you were using a mod?

There were some editor changes and a few other things. So maybe you can provide a few more details, such as what you were doing and under what circumstances? Pictures may also help.

Cheers,

~Claw
I just made a landing leg barely clip through a panel so it was in the middle of it, so I could make the joint move.

Ahh. I was wondering if this is what you were asking about. Like making stock cargo bays?

I haven't tried this in 0.90 yet, so I can't say how it's changed. Although you can look over the last few pages of this thread, since these guys use that technique a lot.

Cheers,

~Claw
